what: Axe, IBM, WAVE, and 11 custom tests

acts.what: used for tests on which chromium fails on some URLs
conduct and report an Axe test

items.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name

must pass any of.description: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

items.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

must pass any of.description: Document has multiple static elements with the same id attribute: utag_26
Document has multiple static elements with the same id attribute: demandbase_js_lib
Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

Page detected as HTML, but does not have a 'lang' attribute
Heading element has no descriptive content

items.message: Content is not within a landmark element

The element with "contentinfo" role is present without an element with "main" role
